documentation.text:
@dev Set UTokens smart contract.
 Emits a {SetContract} event.

@dev Generates `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {GenerateUTokens} event.

@dev Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
@dev Emitted when contract addresses are set

attributes.text:
@dev Set UTokens smart contract.
 Emits a {SetContract} event.

@dev Generates `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {GenerateUTokens} event.

@dev Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`.
 Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
@dev Emitted when contract addresses are set

SetUTokensContract(address).details: Emitted when contract addresses are set

generateUTokens(address,uint256).details: Generates `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`. Emits a {GenerateUTokens} event.

setUTokensContract(address).details: Set UTokens smart contract. Emits a {SetContract} event.

withdrawUTokens(address,uint256,string).details: Withdraws `amount` tokens to the caller's address `to`. Emits a {WithdrawUTokens} event.
